innhold.avsnitt: If you receive one of these benefits from NAV, you are entitled to the parental benefit:

liste.punkt: Care benefit, attendance allowance or training allowance in the event of a sick child

innhold.avsnitt: Particular details regarding the unemployment benefit and work assessment allowance
You will receive the same daily rate for the parental benefit that you receive in the unemployment benefit or work assessment allowance.

If you are a mother who is expecting a child by birth and you receive the unemployment benefit you can have your parental benefit calculated as an average of your income from the six best months out of the past ten months if this will give you a higher payment. NAV will determine which option is best for you.
